Series I. Family photographs and documents
Adella Liebenow Wotherspoon photographs and papers
Adella Liebenow Wotherspoon photographs and papers

Cabinet card portrait of Catherine "Katie" King by Bloomingdale Bros., 59th St. & 3rd Ave., N.Y. Identified (verso) as "Aunt Katie King (Uncle Henry['s] Katie) / Died on the Scolum [sic] / June 15, 1904 / Were going to be married / Sept 15, 1904."

A notation (verso) by N-YHS staff reads: "b. 1888 [sic] in Ireland lived 311 E 37th St / fianc√©e of Henry Liebenow." Henry Liebenow died in 1900, so Katie King was more likely engaged to marry Henry Wulf (1876-1912), brother of Anna (Wulf) Liebenow. According to her death certificate, Catherine King was 26 when she died on June 15, 1904. That places her birth circa 1878.
